title: failed to extract DefId: local_def_id_to_hir_id

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
I was warking with my code, `cargo b`, `cargo c`, but suddenly it broke on `cargo check`. ### Code Sorry, no code. ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.60.0 (7737e0b5c 2022-04-04) binary: rustc commit-hash: 7737e0b5c4103216d6fd8cf941b7ab9bdbaace7c commit-date: 2022-04-04 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.60.0 LLVM version: 14.0.0 ``` ### Error output ``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Failed to extract DefId: local_def_id_to_hir_id 7fbc51800a870e1-79e136f4f6dfb58c', compiler/rustc_middle/src/dep_graph/dep_node.rs:270:17 stack backtrace: 0: 0x7f092119d86d -
